name: GoatEase
tagline: A command line interface for Monetas's GoatD client written in Python
body:
### About GoatD
GoatD is a client daemon for creating digital contracts on the Monetas platform via JSON requests. 

### About GoatEase
This is a simple script for sending basic commands to *GoatD*. At the moment you can create transfer contracts for sending/receiving cryptocurrency (XBT/ETH/etc) or digital currency (CHF/EUR/etc).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
